name: Graffiti Simulator (moontr3)
description:
Information

Simple sandbox pixel graffiti simulator. Here you can draw or paint anything that you want.

Version vr1.1, Windows build.

Controls

LMB - Paint

Scroll on color selector - Change brush color

Scroll - Change brush size

RMB on arrows - Change background

Hold [Del] - Clean wall

[F1] - Hide GUI
